short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension is designed to help you search for relevant keywords on LinkedIn, GitHub or Stack Overflow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How does the InSite Highlighter work?

InSite Highlighter requires no registration or special installation. It is very simple:

1. Create a search in the extension. 
2. Add keywords. For example, stack, locations, positions, etc.
3. Save and run the search and InSite Highlighter will highlight keywords on all sites that are available in the extension

Note that you can set the colour of the highlighter and also the sites where it will underline the words.
